channel.title: RSPS Forum Help please
channel.description: Hello guys im making up a server and would like to know what boards and topics e.g i need on my RSPS forums so i can add them and wondered if there is anyway to make them all in one instead of each individually thanks guys!

item.title: RSPS Forum Help please
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

As one of the more well known website developers and community mangers on Moparscape, I should probably help you, even though this is in the wrong section.

Take a look at my servers and their boards and feel free to mimic them:

Http://www.zealusion.com/community/
Http://www.helix-world.org
Http://www.xythax.org

Beware, the bottom two are still in development.

Read full topic
